description:
Because Tang Yue accidentally molested his step mother and sister, he was forced to leave home to avoid the furious pursuit of his father. 

Who knows that during the run, he would be accidentally dragged into a martial art fight and even encounter the one-eyed demon that everyone was pursuing… Black Bear Beast? Cow Spirit? The legendary blade? What is that? He, Wei Xiao Niu only wants to be a respected and popular hero!

Stepsister Xiao Xiu, seventh mistress of the Mei residency and the two beautiful sister disciples of Mount Lao are all his targets! Even if it is the legendary fierce Western Fairy, he will also subdue her to become his woman!>
